title: lol client opens a new client causing game to close bug fix
body:
when ever I start a game and after the loading screen, as soon as I press enter to chat to other players, another client opens closing the game I just connected  too. its as if the game alt tabs on its own....

all you got to do is delete the shortcut on your desktop to start the game and this wont happen anymore,
just pin the shortcut on the start menu to prevent this.

replies.body:
Oh wow that's weird. It sounds like you still had the icon selected on the destop, and when you hit enter it was hitting enter on the desktop and launching the program you had highlighted. Weird.....

I'm glad you were able to get that figured out though, and I may be stealing this fix to help others tbh XD
